# JointTransforms.Element

**Type Alias**

An individual joint transform in the collection.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias Element = Transform
```

## Identifying joint transforms

- **JointTransforms.ArrayLiteralElement**: The type of the elements of an array literal.
- **JointTransforms.Index**: A position of an individual joint transform in the collection.
